name: Neon Force (Pascal Fitzner)
description:
Description:

Try to escape the inevitable death of falling into the lightless void, by jumping through the gaps in the red death barrier with your teleport gun. This game was developed for Ludum Dare 50 (compo). The time window of this jam was 48h, and all assets and code were produced during the jam.

How to play?
  • Try to reach the gaps in the moving barriers.
  • Make use of your teleport cannon.
  • Try not to fall into the void
  • Have fun
Controls:

Movement - arrow keys/WASD

Camera - Mouse

Fire - Mouse 1

Teleport - Mouse 2

Jump - Space

Contributor:

Pascal Fitzner
